name: Prescription record
text: Each pharmacist or practitioner shall maintain a record of any substitution of an equivalent generic drug product or an interchangeable biological product for a prescribed brand name drug product as provided in this part.  [L 1980, c 187, pt of §1; am L 1996, c 209, §5; am L 2003, c 56, §7; am L 2016, c 242, §5]
